definition: (medicine) carrier (of a recessive gene, virus etc)
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The patient′s mother was the carrier of the heterozygosis mutation in X-chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 患儿母亲为X染色体突变基因杂合子携带者。

sentences.english: Sometimes, people do not exhibit symptoms but are herpes carriers all the same.
sentences.chinese: 那些没有表现出明显症状的疱疹病毒携带者比比皆是。

sentences.english: The tablets were understood from legend to give the bearer authority from Thoth.
sentences.chinese: 在传说中，石板的携带者被视为拥有透特的权威。

sentences.english: People with this variant combination are dubbed "LL" carriers.
sentences.chinese: 带有这种变异基因组合的人被称为“LL”携带者。

sentences.english: To some extent, it can also reduce a carrier's contagiousness.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还有可能减少病毒携带者的传染性。

sentences.english: That the other side is living with HIV after , The river only regret incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 得知对方是艾滋病毒携带者后，小河才后悔不迭。

sentences.english: Objective :To study the effect on filial generation of patients with balance translocation and inversion.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究平衡易位和倒位携带者对下一代的影响。

sentences.english: Normal social contact carries no risk of infection.
sentences.chinese: 与携带者正常的社会接触是没有感染的风险的。

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
